introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is もっとも which you will often hear in conversations when people want to emphasize the highest degree of something or when they are introducing a contrasting point.
meaning_explanation_english: The word もっとも means "most" or "extremely" in a way that indicates something being of the highest degree or rank. It can also serve as a conjunction meaning "however," often used to present a counterpoint or exception to what was previously stated.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 非常に : ひじょうに : very
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of the word もっとも is ひじょうに, which also means "extremely" or "very." While both are used to emphasize, ひじょうに is more frequently used in formal writing and speeches, whereas もっとも can also be used in everyday conversations to denote a counterpoint as a conjunction.
antonyms: 最小 : さいしょう : smallest
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word もっとも is さいしょう, which means "least." While もっとも denotes the highest degree, さいしょう indicates the lowest or smallest degree or quantity.

example_sentences.kanji: この花は最も美しいです。
example_sentences.furigana: このはなは最(も)も美(うつく)しいです。

translations.EN: This flower is the most beautiful.
translations.ID: Bunga ini adalah yang paling indah.
translations.ES: Esta flor es la más hermosa.
translations.VI: Bông hoa này là đẹp nhất.
translations.FR: Cette fleur est la plus belle.
translations.TL: Ang bulaklak na ito ang pinakamaganda.
translations.MY: ဒီပန်းက အလှဆုံးပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 勉強(べんきょう)が最も重要(もっ(ともじゅうよう)です。

translations.VI: Học tập là quan trọng nhất.

example_sentences.kanji: 富士山は日本で最も高い山です。
example_sentences.furigana: 富士山(ふじさん)は日本(にほん)で最(もっと)も高(たか)い山(やま)です。

translations.EN: Mount Fuji is the highest mountain in Japan.
translations.ID: Gunung Fuji adalah gunung tertinggi di Jepang.
translations.ES: El Monte Fuji es la montaña más alta de Japón.
translations.VI: Núi Phú Sĩ là ngọn núi cao nhất ở Nhật Bản.
translations.FR: Le mont Fuji est la montagne la plus haute du Japon.
translations.NE: फुजी पहाड जापानको सबैभन्दा अग्लो पहाड हो।
translations.BN: ফুজি পর্বত জাপানের সবচেয়ে উঁচু পর্বত।
translations.ZH: 富士山是日本最高的山。
translations.TL: Ang Mount Fuji ay ang pinakamataas na bundok sa Japan.
translations.MY: ဖူဂျိတောင်သည် ဂျပန်တွင် အမြင့်မားသည့် တောင်ဖြစ်သည်။
translations.HI: फुजी पर्वत जापान का सबसे ऊँचा पर्वत है।
translations.AR: جبل فوجي هو الجبل الأعلى في اليابان.
translations.FA: کوه فوجی بلندترین کوه در ژاپن است.

example_sentences.furigana: それが最も(もとも)です。

translations.ES: Esa es la opción más correcta.
translations.VI: Đó là lựa chọn đúng nhất.
translations.FR: C'est la chose la plus correcte.

example_sentences.furigana: 猫(ねこ)が最(もっと)も好き(すき)です。

translations.NE: म बिरालोलाई सबैभन्दा धेरै मन पराउँछु।
translations.BN: আমি বিড়ালকে সবচেয়ে বেশি পছন্দ করি।
translations.HI: मुझे बिल्लियाँ सबसे ज़्यादा पसंद हैं।
translations.FA: من گربه‌ها را بیشتر از همه دوست دارم.
